input.sentences: marching through the streets on graduation day .
a picture of my friends and class mates to remember this day .
i was so happy i felt like jumping for joy | and then i did .
my family had to tease me a little and then show off my diploma in a picture .
i had to check that my name was on the diploma because i was so happy . i worked so hard to get this .
output.sentences: Happy graduates are walking in groups down the street.
A group of graduates pose for a photo together.
One graduate does a silly jump in front of the camera.
A graduate holds their diploma with their family and poses for a picture.
Family, friends, and students mingle after the graduation.
